attributes.additional_details:
This e-petition is to ensure Skylon's funding is stopped.

Skylon is a $12billion space tourism hoax that is being funded by the British tax payer!
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Skylon_(spacecraft)

It recently extracted £350m from the government for research. Its been doing this off and on for 20 years!

People from the European Space Agency say its an impossible spaceship!

A $12billion gravy train.

http://tinyurl.com/dy7x6bt

When we are shutting schools and hospitals, why are we funding these space shysters? And all just to let rich people dream about taking space rides. Disgusting!

Additional reading from experts from the European Space agency.
http://www.spacenews.com/article/space-tourism-hoax#.UM25XaWyN5g
